has been granted a divorce in italy because his mother-in-law keeps nagging him. shopkeeper Luca Rossi , 36, told the court in salerno that his wife's mother didn't leave him alone throughout four months of marriage. i'd never believed stories and jokes about mothers-in-law but my marriage was hell and it was all her fault, he said after the hearing. it was hell right from the moment we said' i do' at our wedding until the moment we split, just because my mother-in-law interfered in every single thing in our lives
